Summary: a star seemed to form and explode leaving an expanding ring of light
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Redding
There were no other sightings in Redding on or around December 21st 1974
divs: Sighting DetailsSometime between christmas and January 14th (my enlistment date) I was walking with my girlfriend through a field and telling her of my decision to join the army, the night was clear and we were walking facing the west. In the sky a star seemed to form and expand and "explode" (there was no sound), an expanding ring of light was left behind , much like a wake when a pebble is dropped in the water.There was no distance relationship to make, it looked initially like a star so there was a mental assumption. She has asked me about it since. I am not a believer in "extra-terrestrials" or "spaceships" , this was a phenomena I have never been able to explain, my best explanation has been some kind of missile or rocket testing in Nevada during this time period and landing in the ocean. This is not intended to "report" anything, I am seeking information that would connect this sighting to something ordinary.
